Attach clothespins to a piece of paper and hang it on a wall to create a unique and decorative bulletin board.
Use clothespins to hold together the edges of a tarp or other large fabric to create a makeshift shelter.
Attach clothespins to a hanger and use them as a makeshift clothesline for small items like socks or scarves.
Use clothespins to hold together the pages of a book or magazine to keep them from falling out.
Attach clothespins to a string or wire and use them as a makeshift bird feeder by filling the clothespins with birdseed and tying them to the string.
